name: com.sproutinggames.sprouts.huu
description: A bunch of handy Unity things, all in a single package!

samples.description: A set of scripts required for SHUU that the user can modify.
Prefabs and scripts that implement the input system onto the developer console (commands included).
A set of sample useful commands for the developer console.
A set of simple input binding maps.
Examples of how to use the provided scripts and prefabs.
